text: Dharmendra "Tinu" Suresh Desai is an Indian film director who made his Bollywood debut with 2016 horror film 1920: London starring Sharman Joshi and Meera Chopra. His next release for the year 2016, the Akshay Kumar starrer Rustom, is reportedly based on K. M. Nanavati v. State of Maharashtra's 1959 court case.Kumar begins 'Rustom' with a strong ensemble cast" The movie also features Ileana D'Cruz, Arjan Bajwa, and Esha Gupta in pivotal roles.https://in.bookmyshow.com/person/tinu-suresh-desai/1061160 == Filmography == {| class="wikitable" |- !Year !Film !Director !Writer !Others !Notes |- | style="text-align:center;"|2015 |Baby | | | | |- | style="text- align:center;"|2016 |1920: London | | | | |- | style="text-align:center;"|2016 |Rustom | | | | |- |} == References == ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:Indian male screenwriters Category:Hindi-language film directors Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
